title: Millie Brobby Brown looks brand new with blonde hair
text:
Joining a host of celebrities, Milly Bobby Brown has also chosen to try blonde hair this fall.

The "Stranger Things" star was spotted twice in two different salons playing hooky away from her naturally brunette mane.

There was one Instagram post of Brown sporting a full head of wavy honey blonde hair at Miami-based salon Dafne Beauty Lounge.

"You did really good, it's really beautiful," the 15-year-old actress wrote as she commented on the look.

Photos of blonde Brown didn't stop there, and Y.S.V. Salon & Spa also posted a photo with Brown smiling alongside a stylist Yair Vaknin who was responsible for her highlighted strands.

"Fun time with @milliebobbybrown at the salon her role as Eleven in the Netflix science fiction horror series 'Stranger Things,' for which she received Primetime Emmy Award nominations for Outstanding Supporting," the salon wrote in a caption.

A few days later, Brown posted a full glimpse of her fresh hair hue, which resulted in a softly curled caramelized blonde look. She was seen wearing the look while promoting her new beauty brand, florence by mills, in London.

This actually isn't the first time Brown took a walk on the blonde side. In May, she made heads turn wearing a blonde ponytail while in Beijing for a "Godzilla: King of the Monsters" movie premiere.

Will Brown keep her beautiful blonde 'do? Only time will tell, but for now, her fans are really into it.
description: Millie Bobby Brown showed off a new blonde hair look while promoting her new beauty brand florence by mills in London.
